summary: Ecosys refers to the holistic integration of diverse ideas to build sustainable, decentralized, and regenerative systems. It emphasizes valuing fragmented pieces to foster resilient networks and communities. This approach is particularly relevant in the context of internet fragmentation and broader cultural shifts, aiming to adapt and thrive amidst change.
excerpt: The fragmentation of the internet reflects broader cultural shifts. Ecosystem architecture integrates diverse ideas to create sustainable, decentralized, and regenerative systems from fragmented pieces.
